title: Wessex Ridgeway Trail Walking and Cycle Route

nearby.description: Lyme Regis to Seaton Undercliff Walk

images.title: Derek Harper / Trees near Templeman's Ash
images.caption: Trees near Templeman's Ash. The trees catching the morning sunlight are alongside a small tributary of the River Char which drops down from Pilsdon Pen. Taken from the bridleway gateway on the Wessex Ridgeway Trail a little south of Templeman's Ash.

images.title: Okeford Hill Beacon by Nigel Mykura, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Okeford Hill beacon.

images.title: Chris Downer / Billowy slopes of Bulbarrow Hill
images.caption: Billowy slopes of Bulbarrow Hill. One of Dorset's finest viewpoints, Bulbarrow Hill, has on its top this Iron Age hillfort called Rawlsbury.

images.title: Beaminster: Town Market Square by Mr Eugene Birchall, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Beaminster, Town Market Square

description: Follow the Wessex Ridgeway Trail and enjoy spectacular views of the Dorset countryside on this shared walking and cycling path. The trail begins at Tollard Royal in Wiltshire and heads to Hambledon Hill passing through Ashmore Wood and crossing the River Iwerne on the way. A short section along the river Stour and a wooded spell through Blandford Forest take you to Ibberton and then onto Up Cerne and Maiden Newton . You then head to Beaminster before passing through the beautiful Marshwood Vale and finishing on the Jurassic Coast at Lyme Regis.
